section.name: Bluefin Overview
section.p: This project is where open-source meets automation. Bluefin wires together open-source technologies such as Selenium, TestNG, and Maven to create a powerful open test framework. Bluefin is not a programming language, it does not dictate how you should execute your test, nor does it control how to verify your test cases are successful. Bluefin simply provides some Java APIs (methods/functions) which you can use within your test case to perform browser specific actions.
